an8.24:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava alaviyam viharati aggalave cetiye.
an8.24:1.2: Atha kho hatthako alavako pancamattehi upasakasatehi parivuto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho hatthakam alavakam bhagava etadavoca:
an8.24:1.4: Katham pana tvam, hatthaka, imam mahatim parisam sanganhasi”ti?
an8.24:1.5: “Yanimani, bhante, bhagavata desitani cattari sangahavatthuni, tehaham imam mahatim parisam sanganhami.
an8.24:1.14: Samvijjanti kho pana me, bhante, kule bhoga.
an8.24:1.15: Daliddassa kho no tatha sotabbam mannanti”ti.
an8.24:1.17: Yoni kho tyayam, hatthaka, mahatim parisam sangahetum.
an8.24:1.18: Ye hi keci, hatthaka, atitamaddhanam mahatim parisam sangahesum, sabbe te imeheva catuhi sangahavatthuhi mahatim parisam sangahesum.
an8.24:1.19: Yepi hi keci, hatthaka, anagatamaddhanam mahatim parisam sanganhissanti, sabbe te imeheva catuhi sangahavatthuhi mahatim parisam sanganhissanti.
an8.24:1.20: Yepi hi keci, hatthaka, etarahi mahatim parisam sanganhanti, sabbe te imeheva catuhi sangahavatthuhi mahatim parisam sanganhanti”ti.
an8.24:2.1: Atha kho hatthako alavako bhagavata dhammiya kathaya sandassito samadapito samuttejito sampahamsito utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
an8.24:2.2: Atha kho bhagava acirapakkante hatthake alavake bhikkhu amantesi:
an8.24:2.3: “atthahi, bhikkhave, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagatam hatthakam alavakam dharetha.
an8.24:2.13: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, atthahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagatam hatthakam alavakam dharetha”ti.
